claim: Christopher Mintz-Plasse turned down the role he was offered in Role Models.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Christopher Mintz-Plasse  (  -LSB- mɪnts_ˈplæs -RSB- born June 20 , 1989  )  is an American actor , comedian and musician who has performed roles such as Fogell  (  better known as `` McLovin ''  )  in Superbad , Augie Farcques in Role Models , and as Chris D'Amico in Kick-Ass and its sequel Kick-Ass 2 .

claim: Christopher Mintz-Plasse turned down the role he was offered in Role Models.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dave gets caught up in a bigger fight when he meets Big Daddy  (  Nicolas Cage  )  , a former cop who , in his quest to bring down the crime boss Frank D'Amico  (  Mark Strong  )  and his son  (  Christopher Mintz-Plasse  )   (  Red Mist  )  , has trained his eleven-year-old daughter  (  Chloë Grace Moretz  )  to be the ruthless vigilante Hit-Girl .
